SEO_DESCRIPTION: Carlos Jorge Rodríguez's personal portfolio website. I show my most important github projects, my experience, my articles and more profesional information.
INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Cuban computer scientist from Havana University. Currently working as full-stack engineer building .net and Vuejs applications.
ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: I am, above all, a natural-born problem solver. My innate curiosity, which I've had since childhood, drives me to investigate and find solutions in any area, from the professional to the domestic.
ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION_SECOND_PARAGRAPH: I balance my technical life with rock music, anime, films, and daily reading—a habit that allows me to disconnect from digital overstimulation.
CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: I'm always open for new job oportunities or answer any question. You can reach me through:
CONTACT_FOOTER_PUBLISHED_ARIA_LABEL: Link to project published on GitHub
CONTACT_LINKEDIN_ARIA_LABEL: See my linkedin profile and connect with me
CONTACT_TWITTER_ARIA_LABEL: See my twitter profile and follow me

EXPERIENCE.description: Working for Opus EHR a healthcare platform that tracks leads and manages patient data, enhancing client engagement and increasing admissions.
Worked in a car assembly system using .net tecnologies and AngularJS.
Worked using data virtualization tools improving the data flow performance of a cuban bank.
